txt.en: 'I have spoken with an emmisary of the Trév Gállorg of western Angmar. They have requested our aid in their battles against their Duvárdain bretheren, who serve the dark powers of Angmar.\n\n'Go forth and make war against any of the Duvárdain you find in western Angmar and help turn the tide in favour of those who may become our allies.'

'Your battles with the Trév Duvárdain have been well-fought. I commend you for your efforts on the part of the Free Peoples.\n\n'The Trév Duvárdain shall rue the day when they threw in their lot with the lords of Angmar....'
Handarod is concerned with the Trév Duvárdain who harry the friendly Trév Gallorg of Angmar.
Defeated Trév Duvárdain in western Angmar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Trév Duvárdain in western Angmar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Hillmen of the Trév Duvárdain can be throughout western Angmar, far to the north of Esteldín.\n\nHandarod has asked you to defeat the Trév Duvárdain in western Angmar.
Handarod is at Esteldín in the North Downs, far to the south of Angmar.\n\nYou should return to Handarod and tell him of your battles against the Trév Duvárdain.
